institutions-subtitle: Find any university in a country of your choice.
institutions-description: Discover top universities all over Europe and find the perfect match for your studies.
country-description: Search through a comprehensive list of all academic institutions in {{country}}.
profile-description: Find all information, analyses, and contact details on {{institution}} in {{country}}.
reviews-description: Read reviews of {{institution}} to learn more about the institution.

social-media-twitter-description: See Twitter analysis of {{institution}} to learn more about the institution.
social-media-youtube-description: See Youtube analysis of {{institution}} to learn more about the institution.
online-marketing-description: See online marketing of {{institution}} to learn more about the institution.
online-marketing-performance-description: A detailed analysis of the online marketing performance of {{institution}}.
